item.description:
Columbus Day Weekend is an excellent time of year to be visiting the Mt. Washington Valley area. The fall foliage will be in full bloom so will make for a colorful ride up.

We'd love for you to join us for a fun-filled weekend.

Including:
Friday night welcome social with snacks courtesy of the newlyweds, Kevin and Christina
Friday and Saturday lodging
Saturday and Sunday Continental Breakfast

Optional Valley Activities:
Infamous Fiddler's Green event on Saturday (email for more details)
Oktoberfest at Attitash
Foliage Hikes
Cranmore Ghoullog
Shopping at the Outlets
Fryeburg Fair

The cost for the weekend is $40 for lodging (plus additional cost for most activities).
Credit card payments are available via Paypal for a slight convenience charge. If you prefer this method, advance payment is required. Please advise so I may send you an invoice.

Please let me know if you have any questions!
item.how_to_find_us: All members and guest will be required to sign in upon arrival. Lodging fees are dues at this time.

group.name: Innitou Ski Runners & Rider's Activities Club of New England

item.name: Spend Columbus Day Weekend at the Innitous
